name: Fast Car Extreme Race 3D
description:
Fast Car Extreme Race 3D is an innovation in class of new drift car racing games with real life car drifting stunts and fast paced racing adventures. Get ready for exciting island speed car race which is full of high speed car racing challenges and real breathtaking drifting stunts.
Features:

-Classic city for car racing game
-More city environments to challenge your racing skills
-Realistic 3D graphics and natural surroundings
-Beautiful and Addictive background music
-More amazing top speed car
-customizable game control
